title: 1-on-1 Remote Tech Training
headline: Learn securely and confidently at your pace.
description: Get personalized tech training for any skill level. We offer private, remote sessions on everything from basics to advanced topics.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
sections.paragraph: Studies show people retain up to 70% more when learning through hands-on, personalized instruction—especially when the content is immediately relevant to their own devices and goals.

sections.heading: Your Pace. Your Topics.
sections.paragraph: No group sessions. No fluff. Just one-on-one guidance on exactly what you want to learn—on your schedule.

items: Using email and staying safe online

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: We connect over a secure video call with screen sharing. You follow along as we explain, demonstrate, and answer your questions live.
